channel.title: Looking to make a RAT, but how can I make it without ports?
channel.description: Alright, so hear me out. I can make a RAT with a free program, like Nanocore (Which sucks, I know), but the problem is, how do I get an open port to do so? I have an open port with my ISP, but I hear I can get in trouble for ratting with it, so is there a way to do this without using a paid for VPN? I know VPNs have open ports, but I don't wanna pay for one.

item.title: Looking to make a RAT, but how can I make it without ports?
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed after 30 days. New replies are no longer allowed.
